Class PermissiveAuthorizationManager

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.security.impl.PermissiveAuthorizationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizationManager
public class PermissiveAuthorizationManager extends Object implements AuthorizationManager
A permissive AuthorizationManager.
Since:
14.0
